lead_paragraph: Someone different always seems to step up to keep the Carolina Hurricanes rolling on home ice. This time it was Jay McClement's turn.

headline.print_headline: Carolina Beats Chicago 3-2 to Continue Surge on Home Ice
headline.main: Carolina Beats Chicago 3-2 to Continue Surge on Home Ice

snippet: Someone different always seems to step up to keep the Carolina Hurricanes rolling on home ice. This time it was Jay McClement's turn....
